hero.name: Mehrnoosh Yaghoubi Kalurazi
hero.title: Computer Science Researcher
hero.description1: Passionate computer science researcher specializing in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and Natural Language Processing. With a strong foundation in computational intelligence and advanced algorithms, I am dedicated to pushing the boundaries of AI research and contributing innovative solutions to real-world challenges.
hero.description2: Currently pursuing opportunities for Master's and PhD programs where I can deepen my research expertise and collaborate with leading researchers in the field. My ambition is to publish groundbreaking work at top-tier conferences including CVPR, ICCV, and NeurIPS, contributing to the advancement of computer vision, machine learning, and AI systems.

education.title: Education
education.subtitle: Comprehensive curriculum covering advanced topics in Computer Science, with strong emphasis on Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Algorithms, and Computational Intelligence. Consistently demonstrated excellence across core and specialized courses.
education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Engineering

projects.title: Projects & Research
projects.subtitle: A collection of research projects and academic work demonstrating expertise in machine learning, artificial intelligence, and computational problem-solving.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Professional experience in research, development, and teaching roles focused on machine learning and artificial intelligence.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.subtitle: Comprehensive technical proficiency across programming languages, machine learning frameworks, and modern development tools.

languages.title: Languages
languages.subtitle: Multilingual proficiency enabling effective communication and collaboration in international research environments.

publications.title: Publications & Conferences
publications.subtitle: Current research work and target publication venues at premier AI and computer vision conferences.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: I'm actively seeking opportunities for Master's and PhD programs in Machine Learning and AI. Feel free to reach out for collaborations, research discussions, or inquiries.
